wikipedia_page.main: Karl George Johnston (born 26 February 1979 in Whitby, North Yorkshire) is an English bobsledder who competed for Great Britain at the 2006 Winter Olympics.At the 2006 Winter Olympics held in Turin, Italy, Johnston competed in the men's four-man bobsleigh in a team that included his brother Lee Johnston. The British team finished in 17th position.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2006 Winter Olympics
response: The men chosen for the 2-man and 4-man bobsleigh event were: Marcus Adam, Dan Humphries, Lee Johnston, Karl Johnston and Martin Wright.
